fields.name: Instructions
fields.fieldText:
Work Order Number: {!Get_Bundle_WO.WorkOrderNumber}

Service Appointment Number: {!Get_Bundle_SA.AppointmentNumber}


To Schedule:

1. Select {!Get_Bundle_SA.AppointmentNumber} from the Gantt list. It's identified by the bundle icon.

2. Select the "Candidates" action to schedule the bundle Service Appointment.


Additional Information:

On the Gantt list item chosen above, select "Edit", then "Bundle" to see the bundled Service Appointments.


Once the bundle appointment is scheduled, the bundled items will be removed from the Gantt list.
